data.eml:eml: Two new species of Bolbella Giglio-Tos, 1915 from Southern Africa (Dictyoptera: Mantodea)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Stiewe, Martin B. D. (2007): Two new species of Bolbella Giglio-Tos, 1915 from Southern Africa (Dictyoptera: Mantodea). Zootaxa 1495: 53-60, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.177025
